categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Heartbound was a warship in the Alliance Fleet in 0 BBY. The ship fought in the Battle of Scarif, where Admiral Raddus ordered it and the Deviant to box in the Imperial Imperial-class Star Destroyers.
The Heartbound appears in the novelization of Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, written by Alexander Freed.
